markdown:
Skip to main content

###### Menu

____ Show/hide collapsed content

Are you looking to connect with schools but not sure where to start? 

Find all the school districts that offer Youth Trades Programs in BC below. From there, you can chat with someone who can help you connect with students. 

For First Nations schools in BC, [check out this map](https://www.fnsa.ca/portfolio-items/map-of-first-nations-schools-in-bc-2022/). 

##  school district connector
